mahanuwara shashri dalada maligawata ayath peradeniye megoda kalugamuwa pradeshaye pihiti akkara hatharaka idamaka kos ha thekka gas horen kapa li molakata alewi kirime siddhiyak sambandhayen diyawadana nilamewarayage aarakshaka anshaye polis parikshakawarayeku athadanguwata ganimata polisiya parikshana pawathwayi.adala dawa thogaya rupiyal hatadedahaka mudalakata kundasale dammbaarawa pradeshaye li molakata wikuna thibiyadi polisiya eeye (19) soyagena thibe.siddhiye pradhana sakakaru wana aarakshaka niladhariyage sahayata sitimin dawa thogaya prawahanaya kala bawa kiyana pudgalayaku polisiya athadanguwata gena atha.

sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniya aththanagalla aasanayen jayagrahanaya kota mulu ratema nayakathwaya hobawana agamathi thanathurata melesa path wiya. 1978 di prathambaa warata widhayaka janadhipathi dhurayata path je.aar. jayawardhana mahatha mema thanathura athi karalimata prathama idiripath karana lada prabalama tharkaya wuye ek manthri aasanayakin jayagath thanaththeku rate nayakathwayata path wanawata wada mulu rate ma bahuthara kamaththen nayakathwayata path wana thanaththa janatha paramadhipathya uparima washayen niyojanaya karana bawayi.jayawardhana mahatha widhayaka janapathi kramaya pilibanda adahasa mul warata idiripath kara thibenne 1966 wasare desambar 14 dina widyabhiwardhana sangam shalawe di pawathi raswimakadiya.me ehidi ohu pala kala adahasayi.
